Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with mild non pruritic rash of 11 days duration together with mild easy bruising, mild menorrhagia, Blood. patient is a female shop assistant aged 60 yrs. she denies ever using cigarettes she reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 68 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 40 mg daily x 4 days, and ordered CBC.

content2.Unmatched: she denies ever using cigarettes she reports having no more than one drink a day
